name: Can it run?
description:
for GamesPlusJam 2022
theme: Mix it up

Combine parts to make a funny critter and see how far (or if) it can run.

Controls:

  • Use the arrow buttons to choose the parts. Then press the 'Go' button to start.
  • Leg movement: QWOP
  • When fallen: R to reset

Coding: AkumiOnBass
Art: Draconimous and Rainsong
Music: "Determined Start", from Comigo's "Short Music Loops" collection (https://comigo.itch.io/ Cosmo Myrzail Gorynych)

Software: Unity, PyxelEdit
